nodes.text: Star Wars: Hyperspace Lounge is an upcoming immersive, adult bar that will be coming to the Disney Cruise Line's Disney Wish ship in summer of 2022.

The lounge was developed by a Walt Disney Imagineering team lead by senior creative director Danny Handke, who conceived of the bar as a place for adult Star Wars fans in contrast with the other Disney cruise ships' Star Wars-themed areas aimed at children. The bar was inspired by the sophisticated styles of Dryden Vos's First Light yacht and the Canto Bight casino.

The concept included having the lounge simulate a ship jumping through hyperspace to different locations, using a video screen "viewport" made to look like a widescreen, seven-pane window to create the affect. In order to reference various Star Wars sources, different settings throughout the timeline will be visited as well.
